channel.title: [614] RuneExtream Development Team Recruitment
channel.description: [i]Moderator: I Private Messaged the Administrator about the website, like the rules said and I still haven't heard back. The website doesn't contain harmful material, etc., etc. [/i] [center][u][b][size=36pt]RuneExtream[/size][/b][/u][/center][center][img]http://i322.photobucket.com/albums/nn415/bednarm10/Untitled-2.gif[/img][/center] We are working on a professional project with a goal of creating one of the best RSPS out there. If you are a good Java coder then we are willing to use you to help get this project going. [center][b]Owner/IT Hoster[/b] Death/Magus[/center][center][b] Head Developer[/b] SiniSoul[/center] [center][b]Developers[/b] The Wanderer Position Available Position Available Position Available[/center][center][b][size=14pt]Update Log[/size][/b][/center][center][code][Server Offline] We are making our own 614 source and client (Not using Revengescape source that was recently released.)[/code][/center][center][size=14pt][b]Features[/b][/size][/center][center][code]Will Be Started Upon Hiring Of Development Team[/code][/center][center][size=14pt][b]Pictures[/b][/size][/center][center][url=http://www.mediafire.com/imageview.php?quickkey=811o7vwe5qzbmzx&thumb=5][img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/a42ab43b6470e44371db4d1e2b191dcc2g.jpg[/img][/url][/center] If you are interested in filling one of the available positions please visit our * and post an application in the specified area. Thank you for your interest. I look forward to potentially working with you in the near future.

item.title: [614] RuneExtream Development Team Recruitment
item.dc:creator: @RuneExtream RuneExtream
item.description:
@RuneExtream wrote:

He still has not replied can you look at it please. http://www.rune.wowextream.com

I also wanted to know If I could have the thread deleted, so I can Update in the future when we have our new source online and I can supply the pictures for you.

Read full topic

item.title: [614] RuneExtream Development Team Recruitment
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Wait until the admin replies back, if he never replies back then it was denied. Please post some more images showing off your development so that we know this is actually going to go somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: [614] RuneExtream Development Team Recruitment
item.dc:creator: @RuneExtream RuneExtream
item.description:
@RuneExtream wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:2, topic:356963”]Name: Alex

Position wanted: Moderator/Administrator

Any experience: I’ve been staff over 100 + servers, and owned 5 that where successful in their days. My main positions in servers where usually Staff Manager, picking and handling the staff so the owner could code and keep to himself. I’ve also managed forum staff and handling. I’ve coded 317’s before, that’s where my own experience has come from. I started around summer of '07, learning java from just field work of downloading a blank source and figuring out how to add stuff, ect. Then once 508’s came out, I started the same thing only using bases and having co-coders. Just recently I’ve started on 614 coding, even though it’s impossible for me.

Why should we pick you: I’m dedicated to my work, active constantly. Even with school, I would still monitor the forums and anything you asked me via Phone. I respect everyone the same, as if a normal player was a owner. I try my best to be presentable and nice to everyone around me and I’ve been told by recent staff managers that I am a well trained people person and can adapt to the people’s need.

Time zone/ Country: My time zone is GMT -05, I live in the East Coast of the United States.[/quote]

Can you follow instructions? If not I really have no interest in having you on the team. Where is this post does it say to post an application? Yes on our forums. There is a format there and it explains everything else. Pay attention please.

Read full topic
